name: BOOM box Ninja
description:
Tons of shocking and booming action in the blasting world of BOOM Box ninja!

99 levels all packed with tricky tasks and awesome brain teasing puzzle where you need to
get the ninja to touch base plate and then ZAP his ninja butt with volt shocks in order to get to the next level.

This is truly an amazing game with handcrafted levels of action where you need to time
every boom right, make him bounce off tyres and smash the crates so the tiny ninja man rolls, bounces and booms his way all to the base.

If you miss the base, you need to start over.
So let´s do this, Blast away with the awesome game of Boom box ninja!
